description.title: description
description.description: The human readable description of the policy

TPM2_HANDLE.description: Handles are 32-bit values used to reference shielded locations of various types within the TPM

policyRef.title: policyRef

keyPEMhashAlg.title: keyPEMhashAlg
keyPEMhashAlg.description: Hash used to compute name of the signing key.

signature.title: signature
signature.description: Signature of approved policy and policy reference.

rsaScheme.title: rsaScheme
rsaScheme.description: Used signing scheme for RSA keys.

PolicyAuthorizationTPM.title: PolicyAuthorizationTPM
PolicyAuthorizationTPM.description: Public key and signature for an approved policy.

policyRef.title: policyRef
policyRef.description: Reference value for policy to be searched.

signature.title: signature
signature.description: Signature of approved policy and policy reference.

Or.title: Or
Or.description: Combines policy entries by an OR

policy.description: List of policy elements, each element is AND combined with the other policies in the list
policy.title: policy

anyOf.title: PhysicalPresence
anyOf.description: This policy element requires the TPM to check for physical presence.

anyOf.title: Signed
anyOf.description: Include a signed authorization in a policy.

anyOf.title: Secret
anyOf.description: Include a signed authorization in a policy.

anyOf.title: Locality
anyOf.description: Limit the authorization to a specific locality.

anyOf.title: NV
anyOf.description: Bind a policy authorization to a condition for a certain NV index

anyOf.title: CounterTimer
anyOf.description: Conditional gating of a policy based on the contents of the TPMS_TIME_INFO structure.

anyOf.title: CommandCode
anyOf.description: TPM Command Code to which this policy applies, e.g. NV_WRITE or NV_READ (without TPM2_CC_ prefix)

anyOf.title: CpHash
anyOf.description: Bind policy to a specific command and command parameters.

anyOf.title: NameHash
anyOf.description: Bind a policy to a specific set of TPM entities

anyOf.title: DuplicationSelect
anyOf.description: Qualification of duplication to allow duplication to a selected new parent.

anyOf.title: AuthValue
anyOf.description: Bind policy to the authorization value of the authorized entity.

anyOf.title: Password
anyOf.description: This policy element requires the auth value of the object to be included in the final HMAC calculation

anyOf.title: NvWritten
anyOf.description: Bind policy to the written state of a NV index.

anyOf.title: Template
anyOf.description: Bind policy to a specific creation template.

anyOf.title: AuthorizeNV
anyOf.description: Store an approved policy in an NV index location

anyOf.title: Action
anyOf.description: Policy element that is used as a placeholder for application actions.

anyOf.title: PCR
anyOf.description: Perform Authentication against certain PCR Values

anyOf.title: Or
anyOf.description: Combines policy entries by an OR

Digest Value.description: Definition of Digest Value Structure IN/OUT

TPMT_RSA_SCHEME.title: TPMT_RSA_SCHEME
TPMT_RSA_SCHEME.description: Signing scheme for RSA keys used for policy signing.

TPMS_CONTEXT_DATA.title: TPMS_CONTEXT_DATA
TPMS_CONTEXT_DATA.description: Definition of TPMS_CONTEXT_DATA Structure IN/OUT S

TPML_AUTH_COMMAND.description: Custom Structure for List of Command-Auths
